name: The Great Fleece (Adam Reed)
description:
This is a short 3D Stealth Game that I developed for my portfolio in collaboration with GameDevHQ!

This game includes features that use Cinemchine, Timeline, Post Processing, UI, AI, Point & Click Character Controls, and more!

Please feel free to check it out and see for yourself.

Controls: 

Point & Click = Movement

Right Click = Throw Coin (Distracts Guards)
